Title: Fluent Selenium
Description: Fluent Selenium is a library for .Net and it offers a design to help keeping test code clean and understantable. It provides an enhancement to the selenium remote control. This project was started by some developers at Pyxis Technologies.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Fluent Selenium is a library for .Net and it offers a design to help keeping test code clean and understantable. It provides an enhancement to the selenium remote control. This project was started by some developers at Pyxis Technologies.

Foreword
The goal of this project to facilitate the writing of easy to read web tests for the Selenium test framework. Consequently, much of the documentation for this project is planned to focus on best practices for writing legible tests.

For more information on Selenium see http://seleniumhq.org

This project is the brainchild of Pyxis Technologies http://www.pyxis-tech.com

Presentation slides from the 2009 Montreal Code Camp are available at http://www.slideshare.net/pyxistech/fluentselenium-presentation-code-camp09
